channel.title: Logging trades
channel.description:
anyone no an effecient way of logging trades?
i was thinking of logging them like runescape >.>
i saw some of there stuff and it logs them like this
[code] -name-: gave -name2- coins (9999999) rune axe (50) nature rune (3000) deathrune (1000) blue_partyhat (1) etc -name2-: gave -name- nothing -2 empty lines- repeat[/code]
help a brotha out dawg :p
EDIT: i saw it in my firends old luring video
around 0:06 it shows runescape logs http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V8RYC9pgpaU
